item.title: CentOS 7 kickstart installation
item.description: I have generated kickstart file located on my pc and to make it available over local network I just start python server: [iaroki@workstation ~]$ python -m http.server Serving HTTP on 0.0.0.0 port 8000 (http://0.0.0.0:8000/) ... Now my kickstart config located at http://10.69.0.202:8000/ks.cfg. On another pc or vm I load installation media and in main menu hit Esc. To tell installer where ks.cfg is I must declare it and as it available on network I must assign IP address too:
